posts.post_content:
I've added a bunch of cards to my for sale list including a number of type cards. A real mixed bag. I will continue to add cards to my for sale link as time allows so keep checking back. 

Here is the link:
[url]http://imageevent.com/brailey/cardsforsale[/url]

Please contact me at [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url] for purchases or if you have questions.

Thanks to all who bought from me over the past couple of weeks! I hope everyone is happy with their cards.

Mike Brailey
ebay ID: brails
